pkgmetadata.longdescription: fast-json=========Combines best parts of json and ujson for fast serialization... code-block:: python import fast_json print( fast_json.dumps({ "foo": "bar", "now": datetime.datetime.now() }) )Serializing custom type~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~.. code-block:: python import fast_json from collections import namedtuple MyType = namedtuple("MyType", ["name", "value"]) @fast_json.convert.register(MyType) def _(value): return "name={0.name} value={0.value}".format(value) print( fast_json.dumps({ "one": MyType(name="foo", value="bar") }) )
